def main():
    import sys
    input = sys.stdin.readline
    
    b = int(input())
    g = int(input())
    n = int(input())
    
    ans = n + 1
    if b < n:
        ans -= n - b
    if g < n:
        ans -= n - g
    
    print(ans)
    
    return 0

main()

def badges(b,g,n):
    p = [(i,n-i) for i in range(n+1)]
    count = 0
    for i in p:
        if i[0] <= b and i[1] <= g:
            count += 1
    return count

b = int(input())
g = int(input())
n = int(input())
print(badges(b,g,n))

def gcd(x,y):
    if(y==0):
        return x
    return gcd(y,x%y)




b = int(input())
g = int(input())
n = int(input())
mb = max(0, n - g)
mg = max(0, n - b)
mab = min(n, b)
mag = min(n, g)
cb = mab - mb
cg = mag - mg
print(min([cb+1, cg +1, n + 1]))
